Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 20050027 PQK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the acquisition of real property located at 306 Rutledge Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 33, for continued use as a sanitation garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Brooklyn North District Grg., Brooklyn (20050027PQK)
